name: Greyscale (ultrawidegamer)
description:
You are a mage that needs to fight back against Greyscale that is consuming your world. Find, jump into Greyscale and defeat the crystals inside to weaken the monster causing all of this havoc.

Controls
"Space Key" to jump
"WASD" or "Arrow Keys" for movement
"Left Mouse Click" or "Left Control" to shoot your magic attack
